name: places/ChIJScO8F4dZwokREqC1dIbwl7o
formattedAddress: 266 Broome St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 266 Broome St, New York, NY 10002-4509, USA

editorialSummary.text: Longtime bar maintains its hipster-hang status with beer, cocktails & a laid-back vibe.

originalText.text: Really delicious cocktails, great food menu for groups, and a wonderful atmosphere you won’t find elsewhere in midtown

text.text: Really delicious cocktails, great food menu for groups, and a wonderful atmosphere you won’t find elsewhere in midtown

originalText.text:
Recently I hosted a birthday party here and was able to reserve the back of the bar with only 1 day notice. When I arrived, the manager let me know that he had not been informed about my reservation but that he would do what he could. He was so incredibly accommodating, even letting customers in small parties know that a larger party had reserved those seats. He welcomed me with a birthday glass of champagne and continually checked in with me throughout the night to make sure my guests and I were taken care of.

The space is not large, overall, and the front room can get quite crowded near the bar. The back has lots of seating and patrons are able to order food in from nearby eateries. There is only one bathroom, however, so waiting on line for it will be inevitable. Drinks are reasonably priced and the staff I interacted with was lovely.

text.text:

originalText.text: Just had my birthday happy hour here and couldn't have been more pleased with the spot. Happy hour goes til 8, which is awesome, and it was not cramped or crowded like some other places. Great music played, too!

text.text: Just had my birthday happy hour here and couldn't have been more pleased with the spot. Happy hour goes til 8, which is awesome, and it was not cramped or crowded like some other places. Great music played, too!

originalText.text: Attended a meet up there and really enjoyed the bar. The drinks were strong, cheap and tasty, and the service was great. Only downside is they only take cash or American Express but there is an ATM on site.

text.text: Attended a meet up there and really enjoyed the bar. The drinks were strong, cheap and tasty, and the service was great. Only downside is they only take cash or American Express but there is an ATM on site.

originalText.text: Fun drinking spot with comfy couches and happy hour specials until 8pm. If you’re hungry, ask for the menus and order delivery.

text.text: Fun drinking spot with comfy couches and happy hour specials until 8pm. If you’re hungry, ask for the menus and order delivery.
